title: Who wants to join Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’?
description: A fledgling club of autocrats, strongmen and monarchs is taking shape as US president tries to recast the global order
content: A fledgling club of autocrats, strongmen and monarchs is taking shape as US president tries to recast the global order
